rules_text:
Vigilance, reach
[i]Cupcake[/i] [i]Longshot [/i]– When Elise, Confection Queen enters, you may sacrifice any number of Foods you control. For each Food you sacrificed this turn, Elise deals 2 damage to each opponent.
[i]Sugar Rush[/i] – Whenever two or more creatures you control attack a player, create two Food tokens.
